name: Amrey Sant Pau

reviews.text: We just returned from 3 weeks in Europe most of which was in Spain. We loved the Amrey Sant Pau in Barcelona. We had to book two rooms because we were 4 people but it was a great value. AAA found the hotel for us. The staff were exceptional. They speak English and were able to help us in many ways. They are very professional. We loved the location near the beautiful Sant Pau hospital. The hospital is actually quite lovely. The hotel is a bit off the beaten path of Las Ramblas. However, we were able to walk to most places. The hotel is about 5 blocks from the Sagrada Familia. The breakfast is also excellent. Lots of choices with fresh fruit. They have one computer in the lobby that is free internet as well. We came from the train station and were shocked that we were charged one extra euro for each person and one euro more per bag. There was also an additional charge for coming or going from the Sants train station.
reviews.title: exceptional staff

likes.disliked: — It is a bit far from the center of town (action)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I spent 9 days in the Amrey Sant Pau and can highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel - Modern, Clean and very helpful Staff

reviews.text: The hotel is modern and very clean with quite basic rooms. Ours did not have tea-making facilities but it did have air-conditioning and a lovely view of the Hotel de Sant Pau next door.
reviews.title: Great stay at Amrey

likes.disliked: — bit noisy, pizza at the cafeteria

reviews.text: There was a fresh buffet breakfast each morning with plenty of variety.
reviews.title: Better than most 3-stars

reviews.text: Most importantly, the staff were very helpful and friendly. They helped us with our Catalonian and with bus and train routes and timetables as well as advice on restaurants, clubs and bars. They all understood and spoke English which was very helpful.
